'''Dee Bradley Baker''' (1962) is an  American voice actor and he is the go-to-guy when it comes to animal sounds. He is considered to be one of the most versatile and requested actors in Los Angeles. 

==Roles==
* [[2014]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - Creature voices
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' - [[Gollum]], orcs, cattle
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'' - Orcs, cattle
* [[2003]]: [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (2003 video game)]] - Additional voices
